name: Darling!!
greetingText: You know what you are the best(mujhse kam) and I do feel lucky to have you in my life.
wishText: May the this shit always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Baar baar din ye aaye, baar baar dil ye gaaye, tum jiyo hazaaron saal, ye meri hai aarzoo, Happy Birthday to you!!!
text2: I was going to write a long message
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now go and pick your phone to let me know how much you loved it.
replayText: Or offer me a daaru(hehe) but with you only.
